## Context

- Input file: {{input}}

## Your task

1. Read the input markdown file
2. Simplify the markdown content according to slide presentation best practices
3. Apply appropriate Marp theme and styling
4. Convert to PDF using Marp CLI
5. Report the output file location

## Guidelines for Slide Simplification

- Keep each slide focused on one main idea
- Use bullet points instead of long paragraphs
- Include visuals and diagrams where possible
- Limit text to 6 lines per slide maximum
- Use speaker notes for detailed content
